ygData.subject: Re: Lady Hawk
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawk studied the printouts, they were exactly what Veratis might need. The wild animals have thier own DNA structures. wild creatures can t be combined

Lady Hawk studied the printouts, they were exactly what Veratis might 
need.

"The wild animals have thier own DNA structures. wild creatures can't 
be combined as easily as already simulated ones. For instance the 
cells of translife can be combined and added to a protoform without 
the risk of the cells rejecting each other." Lady Hawk paused 
wondering if it was her imagination or was Squizzy asking all these 
questions to steal her experiment.

"I know a place where I can give you a better example." she thought 
about Zardus' expression if he learned that they'd walked out on 
him."If you'd like to go with me."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> 
> She nodded. "I can try to gather that information for you."
> 
> She walked up to the CR chamber and pressed a few buttons.  Then 
she 
> walked over to a computer console and began printing up the DNA on 
> all the bots that been in that inparticular CR chamber.  She handed 
> the information to LadyHawk. "Here you are. Will there be anything 
> else?"
> 
> She turned around, stopped and turned back to face LadyHawk."I am 
> curious, why are you needing all the DNA from the bots here on the 
> ship? Would you not find better specimens in the wild?"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Lady Hawk got an idea, maybe having an assistant wasn't such a 
bad 
> idea.
> > 
> > "Say, you wouldn't know how to find CR information for a repaired 
> bot would
> > you? These systems just aren't up to the standards meant for a 
bot 
> of my
> > status." She was hoping that Squizzy could gain the information 
she 
> couldn't
> > find.
> > 
> > "I could make it worth your effort to help me gain the 
information 
> I need."
> > Lady Hawk knew that a bot with the information she'd given would 
> have to
> > fully understand the technology involved. Squizzy did which left 
two
> > options, either take her back to Veratis when she went, or have a 
> late
> > supper before she went.
